title: The World According to Bertie
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Now they were married, and living in Comely Bank, in a Victorian tenement halfway up the hill towards the heights of the west New Town. "Not quite Eton Terrace," Bruce had observed. "Nor St Bernard's Crescent, for that matter.

title: 44 Scotland Street
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "So when you went into that building at No. 87 Eton Terrace, you were doing so on trust. You were . . ."
